events.name: Pixelsior 2.0
events.description: Third Eye, the photography club of the NIT, Rourkela, is thrilled to announce our annual photography competition PIXELSIOR, to be held ONLINE starting from 13th of May, 2022 in  collaboration with "MERA BHI PROXY MAAR DENA". The competition aims to provide a platform for all the budding photographers from various schools & colleges pan India to showcase their work, with a chance to win exciting prizes worth ₹5000/-.

events.name: Sketchasaurus
events.description: A game of sketchy sketches and ghastly guesses that will have you in stitches. (Painting organising members or judges is strictly forbidden.). 𝘚𝘩𝘦 𝘥𝘳𝘦𝘸 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘚𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘤𝘩-𝘢-𝘚𝘢𝘶𝘳𝘶𝘴 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘵 𝘪𝘯 𝘫𝘶𝘴𝘵 30 𝘴𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘥𝘴, 𝘸𝘩𝘢𝘵 𝘢 𝘣𝘦𝘢𝘴𝘵! 𝘏𝘦 𝘨𝘶𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘚𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘤𝘩-𝘢-𝘚𝘢𝘶𝘳𝘶𝘴 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘵 𝘪𝘯 𝘫𝘶𝘴𝘵 10 𝘴𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘥𝘴, 𝘴𝘶𝘤𝘩 𝘢𝘯 𝘙𝘎! 𝘑𝘶𝘴𝘵 𝘬𝘪𝘥𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨.𝘏𝘦 𝘨𝘶𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘦𝘥 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘚𝘬𝘦𝘵𝘤𝘩-𝘢-𝘚𝘢𝘶𝘳𝘶𝘴 𝘱𝘳𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘵 𝘪𝘯 𝘫𝘶𝘴𝘵 10 𝘴𝘦𝘤𝘰𝘯𝘥𝘴, 𝘴𝘶𝘤𝘩 𝘢𝘯 𝘙𝘎! 𝘑𝘶𝘴𝘵 𝘬𝘪𝘥𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨.

events.name: PreGrad Campus
events.description: Pregrad the Digital Campus is now here in our College.Now, Learn Live with mentors from Siemens, Barclays, Finserv, Mercedes and startups.Pregrad offers mentorship programs on different topics to prepare the students for the industry before completing their graduation. In these mentorship programs, there is a guaranteed 1 month-long internship after each course.

events.name: Rocket League
events.description: Most people can handle football. Some people can handle cars. But only a seasoned few can take on the mayhem of arcade-style vehicular football. Squads, scope your best men and women out- because these are the big leagues- this is Rocket League! Hunt down your master maneuverers, polish your rusty reflexes: It is time to start your engines, hit the field, and show them how it’s done.

events.name: Checkmate
events.description: A game filled with strategic maneuvers and smart tactics, Chess is a pure masterpiece that everyone enjoys. Every move is crucial in deciding the fate of your army in this battle where numerous calculations have to be made to master this art of war. Brace yourselves as the battle of wits is all set to begin.Aaveg ’22 presents to you the perfect opportunity to showcase your strategies in the game of 64 squares, as we present you Checkmate!!!!

events.name: Speed Cubing
events.description:
Fingers moving rapidly, eyes staring intently, mind working incessantly to decide on the next move….at the end you arrive at the perfect solution.Welcome to the world of cubing!Some believe that cubing is an art, others claim that it is the science of logic, but simply put it is boon to the sharp-witted and a blessing to the nimble-fingered. 
So, pick up your cubes, put on your thinking caps and get ready to race against time! Speed-Cubing has arrived!!! Register now!

events.name: Stumble Guys
events.description: Tired of mobile games with guns and war battles? Want a chaotic and colorful alternative? Then our Stumble Guys event is the perfect platform for you. 32 players, 17 quirky obstacle courses, hilarious falls- but only one can make it to the finish line.With every progressing level, the commotion and excitement escalate too. Do you think you can handle it?Then get ready to run, roll, dash and stumble. Register now.Race to finish.

events.name: Scrabble
events.description:
Are you a man of letters who relishes his alphabet soup for the soul, or as a certain walking dictionary would say, a pure logologist and logophagist? If any of that sounds like you or someone you know then hear us out. Preparations for a war of words (a logomachy!) are in full swing, and your squad (and Uncle Sam) wants you. We promise that Scrabble is not jinxed like the Tower of Babel, but it might just leave your brains in scrambles and shambles. That being said, will you wait for the stars to align or seize the day with your own dazzling syzygy [25] of lettered and storied tiles?
Too many rulebooks spoil the broth, so link with the bio for the official one. Bring your best to the board!

events.name: UNO
events.description:
The numero uno king of card games is here to tickle your minds and shake up the leaderboards. Go gather your cards and get ready to have fun because Aaveg '22 presents Uno. Reread the rulebooks and polish your strategies, this could just be your opportunity to uno reverse the point tally.
Register now!!!

events.name: Dub Sports
events.description: As you reach the climax, will you come through for your Squad? If movies aren’t your thing, but you caught yourself screaming insults over that MI v/s CSK match, Dubsports is for you. The players onscreen will be quick on their feet, and that is exactly what you will need to be with your tongue. Give us a sprinkle of humor and a ton of references to quench our sweat-thirsty jocks- and you will be crowned Commentary King.

events.name: Screen Writing
events.description:
‘The quality of mercy is not strained;It droppeth as the gentle rain from heaven…’
Do these lines still ring in your ears? From The Merchant of Venice to the Multiverse of Madness, talented writers have never failed to captivate us with their impeccable screen writing. Aaveg 22 gives you the opportunity to join the legacy! Register now!

events.name: Runyon Canyon
events.description: If you just love movies enough, you can make a good one. For all fans of the spotlight, Aaveg presents Runyun Canyon, an improv event where the plot thickens with each take.

events.name: Valorant
events.description: Who else is having a great time? Just me? Uahhhhh, I'm gutted.Whether you rise like a phoenix, hunt like a Sova, or help like a Sage, this is your time to carry your squad in the Aaveg’s “Valorant” championship. Each agent has their own specific skillset, so every member in the squad is invaluable for victory. Grind with your allies and clutch the rounds using map strategy and team coordination.The spike is in your hands, what are you going to do?
